Comments.Message: Err... No? You can use whatever enchants you want. Staff-only enchants have no effect on 1H weapons.

I think he means he thinks the comparison chart is showing the 1h weapons are using the points from the 81 SP enchant. Which I'm pretty sure is incorrect, while they do display with it, the value from it is 0.
Actually... I can't find any mainhand / offhand items that Rawr likes. Am I the only one who sees it that way? (Maybe my data is messed up?) Are all staffs really better than all 1h + Oh items?
